title: league of legends istalling
body:
hello guys!
I am just installing league of legends on another computer, I just wanna ask, the client started to lag when it started to install, but before starting the installation progress it didn't lag, is that normal or what?

replies.body: Depending on your hard drive, it could just be taking a bit to download the files and then install them to your PC.  Test out a custom game just to be sure everything is running smoothly!
